TEXT.TITLE: COMPUTER NETWORK TECH <CMNT> SIGNS PACT
TEXT.BODY: Computer Network Technology Corp (CNT) said it signed an equipment maintenance agreement with Storage Technology Corp <QSTK> that would allow Storage to provide field support and maintenance in the U.S. for Computer Network Technology products. CNT designs, manufactures and markets products for high speed networking systems. Reuter
